Package com.appglu.android

The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AppGlu The central class for AppGlu Android SDK.
AppGluSettings This class contains configuration and customization settings and is used to initialize the AppGlu singleton.
To create it, you will need access credentials to authenticate the SDK on the server side.
CrudApi CrudApi contains create, read, update and delete operations to be applied on your tables.
DeviceInstallation Represents a installation of your app on a device.
SavedQueriesApi SavedQueriesApi allow you to run your previously created SQLs on AppGlu and obtain the results.
SavedQuery Simple wrapper around SavedQueriesApi to provide a more model driven way of executing saved queries.
SharedPreferencesUserSessionPersistence Implementation of UserSessionPersistence strategy to keep track of the authenticated mobile application User using Android's SharedPreferences object.
UserApi UserApi has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users.
VersionValidationResult Result of validating the application version with the server side using AppGlu.validateApplicationVersion() method.
If VersionValidationResult.succeed() is false then VersionValidationResult.getAppUpdateUrl() will contain an URL that can be displayed to the user, so he can update the app.
You can configure the URL and the minimum version using AppGlu's dashboard website.
 

Exception Summary
AppGluNotInitializedException It happens when you try to access an AppGlu method before initializing the class using AppGlu.initialize(android.content.Context, AppGluSettings).
AppGluNotProperlyConfiguredException It happens if a required configuration is missing and was not properly set by the time AppGlu.initialize(android.content.Context, AppGluSettings) was called.
 

Package com.appglu.android Description

The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AppGlu, AppGluSettings
